name: Sausage & Peppers Hero
narrative: This Italian-American dish features italian sausage and wheat roll in Sausage & Peppers Hero. Cooks layer the fillings between bread and toast or grill it until melty and warm. Kids think it's fun to bite through the soft bread and crunchy layers.

name: Peanut Maki
narrative: This Fusion mash-up features rice and nori in Peanut Maki. Chefs roll the rice and fillings tightly in nori and slice it into bite-size pieces. Kids think it's fun to see the pretty swirls and pick up each roll.

name: Sesame Crackers with Cheese
narrative: This Snack-time bite features wheat flour and sesame in Sesame Crackers with Cheese. Cooks mix the ingredients together and cook them until they smell amazing. Kids love trying the playful flavors and sharing with friends.

name: Turkey Club
narrative: This American dish features wheat bread and bacon in Turkey Club. Cooks layer the fillings between bread and toast or grill it until melty and warm. Kids think it's fun to bite through the soft bread and crunchy layers.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
narrative: This American dish features wheat tortilla and parmesan in Chicken Caesar Wrap. Chefs pile the fillings onto soft bread and roll or fold it up tight. Kids love holding a bundle of goodies they can munch with their hands.

name: Sardine Bánh Mì
narrative: This Vietnamese dish features wheat baguette and fish sauce in Sardine Bánh Mì. Cooks layer the fillings between bread and toast or grill it until melty and warm. Kids think it's fun to bite through the soft bread and crunchy layers.

name: Peanut Chutney Dosa
narrative: This Indian dish features wheat flour and peanuts in Peanut Chutney Dosa. Cooks pour the batter on a hot pan and flip it until it's thin and golden. Kids like rolling up the soft layers and nibbling sweet bites.

name: Sesame Paneer Tikka
narrative: This Indian dish features paneer (milk) and sesame in Sesame Paneer Tikka. Chefs thread the pieces onto sticks and grill them until they sizzle. Kids love nibbling food right off a stick.

name: Fish Korma
narrative: This Indian dish features fish and cream in Fish Korma. Cooks simmer the sauce with the fillings until it's creamy and fragrant. Kids enjoy spooning the colorful curry over rice and soaking up the sauce.

name: Goan Prawn Curry
narrative: This Indian dish features shrimp and yogurt in Goan Prawn Curry. Cooks simmer the sauce with the fillings until it's creamy and fragrant. Kids enjoy spooning the colorful curry over rice and soaking up the sauce.

name: Peanut Chaat
narrative: This Indian dish features peanuts and yogurt in Peanut Chaat. Cooks toss the crunchy veggies and toppings in a big bowl so everything gets coated. Kids love the bright colors and the crunch in every bite.

name: Sesame Chilli Paneer
narrative: This Indo-Chinese dish features paneer (milk) and sesame in Sesame Chilli Paneer. Cooks sizzle everything in a hot wok so the sauce coats each bite. Kids love the little pops of flavor in every scoop.

name: Peanut Miso Ramen
narrative: This Japanese dish features wheat ramen and peanuts in Peanut Miso Ramen. Cooks boil the noodles and toss them with sauce or broth until they're steamy and flavorful. Kids love slurping the long noodles like a silly game.

name: Sesame Shoyu Ramen
narrative: This Japanese dish features wheat ramen and soy sauce in Sesame Shoyu Ramen. Cooks boil the noodles and toss them with sauce or broth until they're steamy and flavorful. Kids love slurping the long noodles like a silly game.

name: Sausage Ramen
narrative: This Fusion mash-up features wheat ramen and italian sausage in Sausage Ramen. Cooks boil the noodles and toss them with sauce or broth until they're steamy and flavorful. Kids love slurping the long noodles like a silly game.

name: Tempura Fish Udon
narrative: This Japanese dish features udon wheat noodles and fish in Tempura Fish Udon. Cooks boil the noodles and toss them with sauce or broth until they're steamy and flavorful. Kids love slurping the long noodles like a silly game.

name: Cod Katsu
narrative: This Japanese dish features cod and wheat panko in Cod Katsu. Cooks coat the pieces and fry them until the outside turns golden and crispy. Kids like crunching into the crisp edges and juicy middles.

name: Unagi Don
narrative: This Japanese dish features fish and soy sauce in Unagi Don. Cooks simmer the rice with the mix-ins until each grain is fluffy and tasty. Kids like scooping up little mounds of rice packed with surprises.

name: Butter Salmon Rice
narrative: This Japanese dish features salmon and butter in Butter Salmon Rice. Cooks simmer the rice with the mix-ins until each grain is fluffy and tasty. Kids like scooping up little mounds of rice packed with surprises.
